Text.Text: Majestic Dolphin
Housing such a majestic Creature here attracts many visitors from far shores. Just look at it.. wiggling with his fins. Meb Meb.
Alchemy Apprentice
Begins to study the fundamentals of the natural elements. With a few accidents...
In dire need of a master...
Unwanted Bard
"Here's to a little serenade"... "NOoooo! By Cernunnos stop him!"
Celtic Grave Keeper
Preserves the ancient burial mounds.
Religious Merchant
Offers a variety of different religious items for any deity.
Impoverished Priestess
Demonstrates to believers how to thrive without material resources.
Tavern Guard
Makes sure every denarii is payed.
Young Arborist
Enjoys caring for trees.
Wild Pony Huntress
Keeps behaving like a wild pony.
Overloaded Sailor
"A little less armor here and who needs extra sails? We have cargo to ship and aren't sitting geese."
Drainage Worker
Loves to drain the real swamp. Literally.
Warehouse Worker
Uses some extra hands to organize the goods here and there.
Aulus Pius, the Watchful Inspirator
Inspires all city guards with tales of heroic deeds performed by humans during terrifying disasters. Seizes this opportunity to offer improved training.
Aurelius Cautus, the Bureaucrat
Uses Denarii to optimize bureaucratic processes. In the process, one or two coins end up somewhere else. "Now please take a number and wait until you hear from us."
Gaius Armifex, Local Armorist
Reroutes local armaments for the Custodes. Hint: Armories in Range apply the Area Effect for all Custodia in their range.
Valerius Saponius, Master of the Soap
By using soap in big pools of water we can clean so many people at once. Hint: The Effects are applying to every building in Street Range.
Vidumaros, Celtic Traditionalist
Keeps celtic tradition alive through tellings of former generations.
Aquarius, the Watersupplier

Shows the importance of water systems by creating supply chains of water for Medici and Vigiles. Hint: Cistern in Range apply the Area Effect to all Medici and Vigiles in their Street Range. Maintenance will be only increased for the cistern.
Probus, Honest Gambler
Checks every dice with a keen eye, so only fate decides your chances.
Julia Archivola, the Living Bibliothēcaria
Expands the library up to the ceiling with knowledge from distant lands. Let's hope there's no fire nearby.
Varius Flexus, Human Biologist
Traveled to many coasts to observe and study all different types of human bodies. One of the first writers of scrolls on the flexibilty of human anatomy.
Priestess of Mars
Highly devoted and preaches the roman virtues of the deity Mars.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Mars...
Priestess of Ceres
Highly devoted and preaches the roman virtues of the deity Ceres.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Ceres...
Elder Druid of Cernunnos
Knows the old celtic virtues of the deity Cernunnos.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Cernunnos...
Elder Druid of Epona
Knows the old celtic virtues of the deity Epona.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Epona...
Priestess of Mercury
Highly devoted and preaches the roman virtues of the deity Mercury.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Mercury...
Priestess of Minerva
Highly devoted and preaches the roman virtues of the deity Minerva.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Minerva...
Priestess of Neptune
Highly devoted and preaches the roman virtues of the deity Neptune.
Needs certainty that the island follows the deity Neptune...
Ethelia, Hag Actress
Plays the role of a ugly hag, who loves to collect in other peoples eyeballs. Always open for a deal. In her favor of course.
Ocumare, Eagle of the Sea
Swift and with an eagles eye is a force to be reckoned with.
Ames, Ship Distorter
Arranges armor and goods in such a way that everything appears larger and more formidable. And indeed becomes so.
Iana Rodericia, Young Environmentalist
Rejects decadence and instead demonstrates an ecological lifestyle in harmony with nature.
Marcus Speculator, Mineral Expert
Knows where to find any needed minerals.
Piso Agricola, Custodes of the Land
Enjoys the countrylife.
Publius Arboreus, the Planter For Generations
Reaps the fruits of what was planted generations ago.
Junia Pascua, Animal Caretaker
Best caretaker any animal could dream of.
Ulpius, Bacchus Blessed
"And the next round goes on me!"
Sericus Garum, Far Eastern Spicer
Adds a particularly salty flavor to everything. Creates a taste of the desert on the tongue.
Lucius Textor, the Textile Craftsmen.
Always stocks up on every kind of fabric.
Cornelia Fusilla, Fluid Artista
Knows how to work with Liquids and Jars.
Decimus Argentarius, Experienced Silver Geologist
Has a talent for finding silver deposits.
Domitia Regilla, Always Accompanied
Always in need of a group of Liberti for her luxurious needs.
Cornelia Operosa, the Fascinated One
Is fascinated by the hard work of plebeians. Enjoys the bustling and artisanal activities.
Gnaeus Geranus, the Cranebird
Enjoys everything with a crane. Would love to sail to see more cranes, if he wouldn't be seasick.
Vitrearios, the Glassmaker
Shapes the glass in form directly in front of your eyes.
Gaius Septicius, the Silversmith
Silver is the new Gold!
Vullius Brixantus, the Master Alchemist
A true master of the natural elements. Ready and at your service.
Ready for a young apprentice.
Wojtecus, the adopted persian Bear
"Quick! Follow the bear! He will lead us to the honey!... or catches a spy again."
Apprilia, Early Engineer
Dreams of an age of machines and steam.
Buritus, Architectus Bureaucraticus
Architect of the bureaucratic system and is a master getting everything sorted out for anyone.
Leo Victor, Roaring Gladiator
Roars loud like a lion! Ready to fight for glory!
Marcus Favor, the Beloved Crowdfavorite
“What an exquisite performance!” “What an amazing talent!” “When I grow up, I want to be just like him!”
Aquarius Crassicius, Neptune Blessed Fisherman
Catches everything with giant nets. Sandales inclusive... and sometimes... a sheep? How?!
Silvius Vercannos, Legendary Hunter
Such a great hunter, he would even catch mystical creatures.
Marcus Pius, Fair and Thoughtful Patronus
Knows without a mass of Liberti, he would be nothing.
Vigilant Sentry
Checks every corner.
Motivtated Bureaucrat
Tries his best to optimize processes.
Angry Bath Attendent
"By Neptune, don't jump off the edge of the bath!"
Pagan Ritualist
Executes celtic pagan rituals to the Romans' detriment.
Rushed Roaster
Cooks the roast very quickly... unfortunately not long enough. Note: The effect applies to all residential buildings within Street Range of the Alder Council.
Gambling Debt Collector
Allows high-risk bets just as an excuse to visit your home. Or better said his new home.
Public Teacher
Investing into the future results in investing into Knowledge.
Aspiring Toga Designer
Uses the theater stage to present his first toga collection. Hint: The effect applies to all residential buildings within Street Range of the theater.
Mischievous Actor
Brings nearly everyone to a good laught, except the nobility.
Retired Smith
The youth can always learn from the elder ones.
Clay Digger
Kept the fun from digging into Clay since the childhood.
Upholsterer Trainer
Teaches how to handle needle tools to prevent worker outages.
Roman Amenity Planner
Everyone should enjoy the amenities of the romans.
Mud-covered Reedgrower
"Huh? What are you doing in my swamp?! "
Eager Huntress
Yearns for the hunt.
Beachworker
Could work at the beach all the time.
Habitual Heater
"Baking stuff makes it taste better, why shouldn't it work for other things?"
Aspiring Plebeian
Thanks to her hard work, she is ready to move up to the next roman stratum.
Aspiring Equites
Rich, but not rich enough to be considered that relevant.
Grounded Nobleman
Not as aloof as other nobles.
Expericened Warehouse Worker
A living catalog for the warehouses.
Noble Archer
Brings his hunting lessions to good use.
Cornelia Regula Rectrix, Strict Economist
Triggers the heart of roman Craftsmanship and Trade. Hint I: Productivity applies to All Production Buildings in Street Range. Hint II: In Albion, the temple counts as a forum.
Aurelia Ordinata, Worker Organizer

Manages workers for greater efficiency and organizes them to the best suited profession. Hint I: Workforce Modifier applies to All Buildings in Street Range. Hint II: In Albion, the temple counts as a forum.
Armored Sailor
Sacrifices storage space for more defense.
Motivated Shipyard Worker
Swings the hammer quicker for your fleet.
Strong Rope
A tough rope keeps this ship at bay.
Fabia Novella, Experimental Crafter
Teaches experimental craftmanship which causes people stop trusting the gods.
Lucia Illuminata, Enlightened Housekeeper
Expert in caring for specialists from everywhere. Hint: Slot Effect applies to the Villa and Officia on the Island, but requires a Marvel in Radius of this Specialist.
Lucia Domitius Catavignus, Romano-Celtic Envoy
Closes the cultural gaps between Romans and Celts.
Merchant with Entourage
Has so much to trade, always in need a company of strong man around.
Lovestruck Wader
Wants to bring flowers to his love, but only finds herbs.
Quintus Merula, Master of Invitations

Writes invitations for specialists from all over the known realm. Hint: Slot Effect applies to the Villa and Officia on the Island, but requires a Marvel in Radius of this Specialist. Increased Cost are applied to Marvel, Officia and Villa.
Julia Culinaria
"Show me the kitchen and I'll whip up something delicious faster than you can blink."
Bennicus Sartor Steckus, Swift with the Needle
"Fine feathers make fine birds! You can never have enough clothes!"
Junia Daedala, Master Embellisher
Through her artistry, she shows the world her own beauty.
Irresponsible Arms Trader
“Everyone should have at least one, if not several, weapons! What could possibly go wrong?”
Food Artist
Prepares food like an inspiring spectacle. But who cleans up the mess?
Vercatullos, Sweaty Trainer
He will really make people sweaty. Everyone should have extra tunics and robes ready. Hint: The effect applies to all residential buildings within Street Range of the Sportsground.
Practice-oriented Instructor
“Only through practice you can solidify knowledge!... Ouch! Medicus!”
Ambitious Forester
Making trees usable is his calling.
Quiet Farmer
His mind is always on his fields.
Prudent Livestock Breeder
Make sure that every animal fulfills its contribution.
Happy Plantation Helper
"You don't need much variation to be happy."
Morigenos Conchylius, Noble Shellcollector
The sea can always be heard whispering nearby.
Coperovicos, the first Rock-born
Similar to his brother Stannos, he has a sixth sense for copper deposits.
Stannos, the second Rock-born
Similar to his brother Coperovicos, he has a sixth sense for tin deposits.
Supplier
Fulfills delivery orders for residents in the surrounding area. Hint: This area effect only affects residential buildings around the production building, but can stack.
Independent Sculptor
Uses the best stone in the region to create busts of his clients.
Cassiocaseos, Culinarius Casei

Came up with the idea of melting cheese and combining it with sweet fruit. Some love this experimental cuisine, others hate it and give free rein to their anger. Note: The effect applies to all residential buildings within Street Range of the Market or Forum.
[PH]
[PH]
